attributes.action: For there to be an 'I disagree' option towards individual HM Government e-petitions
attributes.additional_details:
I disagree with some of the e-petitions that I see and am unable to show it.

I believe that an option to show 'disagreement' would help the government see how much real support there is for an issue if there is a low number of people choosing to disagree, or how controversial that issue really is, when as many people disagree with the petition as are 'for' it.
